title: Abraham Lincoln Birthplace National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons for 2016      Abraham Lincoln Birthplace Unit  January 1 through May 29: 8:00 a.m. - 4:45 p.m. (ET)*  May 30 through September 5: 8:00 a.m. - 6:45 p.m. (ET)September 6 through December 31: 8:00 a.m. - 4:45 p.m. (ET)**The park is closed on January 1, November 24 and December 25Abraham Lincoln Boyhood Home at Knob Creek Grounds open daylight hours year around  Interpretive staff available as follows:  Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday and Monday only May 30 through September 5: 8:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. (ET)*The park is closed on January 1, November 24 and December 25
